New Directory or LLB Dialog Box

Requires: Base Development System

Select File»Save or File»Save As and click the New button to display this dialog box. This dialog box appears when you disable native file dialog boxes and then save a file to a new LLB.

Use this dialog box to create a new LLB.

This dialog box includes the following components:

  • Name of new directory or LLB—Enter the name of the new directory or LLB in this field.
  • Directory—Creates the directory and displays the File dialog box.
  • LLB—Creates the LLB and displays the File dialog box.
